name: GeoSPARQL Topology: Egenhofer Properties
abstract: Properties which can be used to describe the topology of geometries using RCC8 relations

examples.title: Equals relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to itself using the geo:ehEquals relation.

examples.title: Disjoint relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehDisjoint relation.
